items.name: Breaking Bad
items.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

items.name: Stranger Things
items.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

items.name: The Office
items.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
